column1: Usage: mdfind [-live] [-count] [-onlyin directory] [-name fileName | -s smartFolderName | query]
list the files matching the query
query can be an expression or a sequence of words

column2: -attr <attr>      Fetches the value of the specified attribute
-count            Query only reports matching items count
-0                Use NUL (``\0'') as a path separator, for use with xargs -0.
